3-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(t.title) AS movie_title
 FROM keyword AS k,
 movie_info AS mi,
 movie_keyword AS mk,
 title AS t
 WHERE t.id = mi.movie_id
 AND t.id = mk.movie_id
 AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
 AND k.id = mk.keyword_id
 AND k.keyword LIKE '%-%'
 AND mi.info IN ('NZD 120,000', 'Uruguay:5 July 1974', 'Spain:9 April 1998', 'Karelia, Finland', 'Macbeth!')
 AND t.production_year > 2008;
